=======================================================

Dragon Ball Z: Warriors Boutoden Mini is a 2D fighting game that brings some of the main characters of the popular drawing Dragon Ball Z. Among the fighters are available Goku, Vegeta, Krillin, Bardock and Ten Shin Han. Soon to start the game, you can choose one of these characters and start fights or randomly select a fighter.

It is not allowed to configure the game in fullscreen, since the screen where it is displayed can not be changed or resized. For most people already know the story of Dragon Ball, there is no explanation or description of the characters, just select the fighter and prepare for fights.
